name: 526's Cusp of Serenity
description:
Disclaimer: This model is a little out-of-control. But dammit, I love it to death. It's intentionally kind of unhinged, and loves creating colorful, dreamlike, surreal illustrations. Don't use this model expecting a strong general-purpose experience. I can't make any guarantee that this model will be clean and coherent. This model was a creative exploration with the goal of a certain strong vibe and wacky creativity, not raw power and cleanliness. Leans a good bit towards its own illustrative style, so alternative styles may be trickier.

To get the full power of this model's creativity, I strongly recommend limiting your negative prompting as much as reasonably possible. You can use the bad-artist negative embedding to achieve certain effects, but beyond that embedding, I don't condone a lot else unless you are very sure of what you're doing.

If you're still interested by this model, read on.

SOME USAGE TIPS AND INFO:

  • I recommend keeping CFG around 7 and below. 5-7 is always a safe bet.

  • All my images were generated with 30 steps DDIM and upscaled via img2img at 0.47 strength (High Res Optimization, for InvokeAI users). You may need more steps if you aren't upscaling through that method.

  • Put in OliDisco style at the start of your prompt for interesting, trippy effect. Works best on vague as well as short prompts.

  • To kill unprompted extra random colors, put rainbow in your negative prompt, and weight as needed.

  • To kill the light glowing effect, put backlighting in your negative prompt, and weight as needed.

  • You can also try triggering the small portion of flat illustration LoRA with flat illustration in your prompt, the Vector Graphics Art Style LoRA with flat color in your prompt, and the Dreamy Vector Style LoRA with vectorstyle. Note those LoRAs were mainly used to enforce a style, but you can still get interesting effects with them.

MODEL BACKGROUND:

This model was based off of my 526Mix-Animated mix. While I would have loved to use my trusty ol' 526Mix, the Animated version has better lighting introduced by Nerfgun3's Macaron Mix that I felt would be more in line with the effects I wanted.

To create this model, I merged a bunch of LoRAs on top of 526Mix-Animated. This was done in two parts, with the goal of expanding on 526Mix/526Mix-Animated's natural creativity, while creating some nice cozy and thoughtful vibes.

Full credits to the authors of these LoRAs, and I suggest using them on their own to get their full powers.

Part 1:

  • AlchemistW's Enhanced Backlighting at 0.40 multiplier

  • IronCat's Anime vibrancy & simplifier at 0.40 multiplier

  • TLME's Vector Graphics Art Style (No lineart) at 0.80 multiplier

  • olivetty's Soul of Disco Diffusion at 0.60 multiplier

This model made stunningly bright and colorful illustrations, but was often a bit too saturated.

Part 2:

  • AlchemistW's Enhanced Backlighting at 0.50 multiplier

  • l616631804190's flat illustration at 0.65 multiplier

  • olivetty's Soul of Disco Diffusion at 0.60 multiplier

  • The_Jingo's Cosmic Rainbow at 0.25 multiplier

  • Gertan's Dreamy Vector Style at 0.50 multiplier

Parts 1 and 2 were then mixed at a 50/50 ratio to balance each other's quirks.

Judging by the time I typed 'that dumb LoRA has me wanting to make an unhinged surrealist model...' in the InvokeAI discord server, total experimentation time was about 11 hours, not including the several hours of pre-exploration before going through on the idea for this model.

meta.prompt:
It's amazing what the hard times can reveal
Like who shows up, who walks away, and who's for real
So, take me on, I'll take the wheel, and we can both outrun the past
We will always live forever if we don't look back
(drybrush speed painting)+, realistic anime lone girl sitting and looking up at a grand vivid night sky, forest, paint (strokes)+, facing away, astrophotography, dark, after hours

in OliDisco style, 
Get round the fire with a glass of strong ale
And tell us a story from beyond the pale
Bury some seeds and expect some strong branches
I'll tend to the flame, you can worship the ashes
vector art of a lone cute happy fox sitting in a fairy garden, flowers, sparkles, colorful, warm, fairy huts

in OliDisco style,
What will we do when the world it is ending 
And time it is halted for friend and for foe? Try to hold on to the time as it passes 
I'll tend to the flame, you can worship the ashes
do there exist many worlds, or is there but a single world?
boy drawing a picture by the lake, vivid colors, falling leaves, cozy, warm sunlight

For we may or might never all meet here again
Our ship lies at anchor, she's ready to dock
I wish her safe landing, without any shock
If ever I should meet you by land or by sea
I will always remember your kindness to me
detailed realistic anime illustration of a cozy rustic village in a grand meadow

closeup flat shaded anime portrait chubby--- sunlit++ round faced latina professional photo, (vivid shadows)-------- over the landscape in wv looking out over natural limestone outcrops on a rocky ridge inside monongahela national forest, west virginia wildlife, nature, trees, cloudy sky (ablaze in beautiful spectrum of summer hues,)--- (just before sunset.)----
